Serotiny | Back-End Engineer (First Hire, full-time) | Bay Area, CA

We're a synthetic biology company that has built the beginnings a biologically-aware API for designing novel genetic machines.

At Serotiny we invent proteins to cure cancers and genetic diseases. We help design proteins involved in CAR-T therapies, CRISPR systems and other multi-domain protein therapeutics.

The API is written in Go - the front-end is written with Ember. We're looking for someone who has shipped code, wants to build a company's digital infrastructure, and wants to learn some biochemistry.

https://serotiny.bio/careers/
